summary:
This adds a new perk to the smithing perk tree.
There are 5 levels of this perk ranging from 20% to 100% stronger tempering.
descriptionHtml:
This adds a new perk to the smithing perk tree.
There are 5 levels of this perk ranging from 20% to 100% stronger tempering.

Smithing Mastery 1/5 - 20% Stronger Tempering
Smithing Mastery 2/5 - 40% Stronger Tempering with requirement of skill level 20 smithing
Smithing Mastery 3/5 - 60% Stronger Tempering with requirement of skill level 40 smithing
Smithing Mastery 4/5 - 80% Stronger Tempering with requirement of skill level 60 smithing
Smithing Mastery 5/5 - 100% Stronger Tempering with requirement of skill level 80 smithing

For those of you would wish to just add these using command prompt here are the codes
--------Using the commands it doesn\'t show to be working untill you\'ve add all 5 perks--------
----if your going to use the commands enter all 5 codes like this and you should be good----
player.addperk 09000D62
player.addperk 09000D63
player.addperk 09000D64
player.addperk 09000D65
player.addperk 09000D66
author: darkknight098 AKA --Reaper
